name: Classic Burger
description: A delicious cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Creamy Pasta Alfredo
description: Rich and creamy pasta Alfredo with parmesan and garlic sauce.

name: Fresh Garden Salad
description: A refreshing salad with mixed greens, vegetables, and vinaigrette dressing.

name: Assorted Sushi Rolls
description: Variety of sushi rolls with fresh fish, avocado, and soy sauce.

name: Spicy Chicken Taco
description: Delicious chicken taco with salsa, lettuce, and cheddar cheese.

name: Grilled Sirloin Steak
description: Tender sirloin steak cooked to perfection with mashed potatoes and vegetables.

name: California Sushi Bowl
description: A bowl of sushi rice topped with fresh fish, avocado, and spicy mayo.

name: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
description: Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream and whipped cream.

name: Grilled Chicken Wrap
description: Grilled chicken wrap with lettuce, tomato, and honey mustard dressing.
